data.title: Update on Ilaiyaraaja Biopic: Dhanush’s Movie To Go On Floors Soon, Claim Reports
data.meta_description: Dhanush’s ambition of playing the role of maestro Ilaiyaraaja is allegedly inching closer to reality. The actor has been reportedly roped in to play the lead in the maestro’s much-awaited biopic. While many details about the movie have not been revealed yet, rumors are rife about its cast and production. The latest report has claimed […] The post Update on Ilaiyaraaja Biopic: Dhanush’s Movie To Go On Floors Soon, Claim Reports appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming New
data.text:
Dhanush’s ambition of playing the role of maestro Ilaiyaraaja is allegedly inching closer to reality. The actor has been reportedly roped in to play the lead in the maestro’s much-awaited biopic. While many details about the movie have not been revealed yet, rumors are rife about its cast and production. The latest report has claimed that the movie’s shoot will begin soon.

For the unversed, Dhanush often showcases his admiration for Ilaiyaraaja via his social media. The actor is a massive fan of the maestro, and the upcoming movie is touted to be his dream project. Once, he took to X (formerly Twitter) and penned what the music legend means to him. He called Ilaiyaraaja his God, thalaivan, isaignani, music, inspiration, soul, and heartbeat.

When will Dhanush start shooting for Ilaiyaraaja biopic

According to a report by OTTplay, Dhanush will soon begin filming for Ilaiyaraaja biopic. The report claimed that the shoot for the awaited film will commence on March 20 at Leela Palace in Chennai. Furthermore, Arun Matheswaran, who recently directed Captain Miller starring Dhanush, will be directing this biopic.

Discussions around the biopic have been going on in the film circles for quite a while now. It was also reported that the makers were eyeing to cast superstars Rajinikanth and Kamal Haasan in pivotal roles in the movie. The two legendary actors will allegedly make special appearances in the movie. For the unversed, Ilaiyaraaja has composed many tunes for the movie of these two stars.

The biographical film is expected to cover the legend’s unmatchable journey in the music industry. Ilaiyaraaja has been in the industry for over 50 years and has composed around 7,000 melodies. Therefore, fans are eagerly waiting for any update on the film.
